title: Rhineriver's Fashionably Late GOItober 2023 Art (The Complete Collector's Edition)
content:

* **[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/2k24biatch Rhineriver's SCiPTEMBER 2024 Art (Limited Edition Pressing)] (SCiPTEMBER 2024)**
[[/div]]

@@ @@

This is incredibly late, but I figured I might as well put all of these into a post on here instead of just on Twitter. I was //going// to post this on the 1st, but I got caught up in other stuff and haven't really had enough time to sit down and put this together, so please enjoy this almost two weeks late.

I've done this challenge in some form (SCiPTEMBER included) for three years now, and this is the first time I was able to finish them all! I'm very proud of a lot of these works so do consider looking them over :)

Working on these (as well as putting GOItober together in the first place) has been incredibly fun, thank you to my co-creators [[*user ThatGuyThatTime]], [[*user AwhRyan]], [[*user Cicada3301Fan]], and [[*user typoenjoyer]] for being really cool and making all of this possible! Check out the GOItober Hub [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023 here]!

-----

Click the images to be taken to the article!
